verses.verse: The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of God. <S%H410><s%> The expanse <S%H7549><s%> shows his <S%H5046><s%> handiwork. <S%H4639><s%>
Day <S%H3117><s%> after day <S%H3117><s%> they pour <S%H5042><s%> forth speech, <S%H562><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> after night <S%H3915><s%> they display <S%H2331><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
There is no speech <S%H562><s%> nor language, <S%H1697><s%> where their voice <S%H6963><s%> is not heard. <S%H8085><s%>

Their voice <S%H6957><s%> has gone out <S%H3318><s%> through all the earth, <S%H776><s%> their words <S%H4405><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the world. <S%H8398><s%> In them he has set <S%H7760><s%> a tent <S%H168><s%> for the sun, <S%H8121><s%>
which is as a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> coming out <S%H3318><s%> of his room, <S%H2646><s%> like a strong man <S%H1368><s%> rejoicing <S%H7797><s%> to run <S%H7323><s%> his course. <S%H734><s%>

His going forth <S%H4161><s%> is from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> his circuit <S%H8622><s%> to its ends; <S%H7098><s%> There is nothing hidden <S%H5641><s%> from its heat. <S%H2535><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s law <S%H8451><s%> is perfect, <S%H8549><s%> restoring <S%H7725><s%> the soul. <S%H5315><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s testimony <S%H5715><s%> is sure, <S%H539><s%> making wise <S%H2449><s%> the simple. <S%H6612><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s precepts <S%H6490><s%> are right, <S%H3477><s%> rejoicing <S%H8055><s%> the heart. <S%H3820><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s commandment <S%H4687><s%> is pure, <S%H1249><s%> enlightening <S%H215><s%> the eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is clean, <S%H2889><s%> enduring <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s ordinances <S%H4941><s%> are true, <S%H571><s%> and righteous <S%H6663><s%> altogether. <S%H3162><s%>

More to be desired <S%H2530><s%> are they than gold, <S%H2091><s%> yes, <S%H7227><s%> than much fine gold; <S%H6337><s%> sweeter <S%H4966><s%> also than honey <S%H1706><s%> and the extract of the honeycomb. <S%H5317><s%>
Moreover by them is your servant <S%H5650><s%> warned. <S%H2094><s%> In keeping <S%H8104><s%> them there is great <S%H7227><s%> reward. <S%H6118><s%>
Who can discern <S%H995><s%> his errors? <S%H7691><s%> Forgive <S%H5352><s%> me from hidden errors. <S%H5641><s%>

Keep back <S%H2820><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> also from presumptuous <S%H2086><s%> sins. <S%H4910><s%> Let them not have dominion over me. <S%H8552><s%> Then I will be upright. I will be blameless and innocent <S%H5352><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> transgression. <S%H6588><s%>

Let the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%> and the meditation <S%H1902><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%> be acceptable <S%H7522><s%> in your sight, <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my rock, <S%H6697><s%> and my redeemer. <S%H1350><s%>
